title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
summary: Introduces the fundamental concepts of crafting prompts to effectively interact with AI systems.
content: This section provides an overview of prompt engineering, explaining how to create prompts that guide AI systems like ChatGPT to produce desired outputs. It covers the importance of clarity, context, and specificity in prompt design.

title: Understanding Prompt Structure
summary: Explains the key components of a prompt and their respective roles in guiding AI responses.
content: This section delves into the anatomy of a prompt, detailing elements such as directives, context, examples, and output indicators. Understanding these components helps in crafting prompts that yield more accurate and relevant AI outputs.

title: Shot-Based Prompting
summary: Explores the concepts of zero-shot, one-shot, and few-shot prompting and their applications.
content: This section discusses how providing different numbers of examples (shots) in prompts can influence AI performance. It explains the scenarios where each technique is most effective and provides examples of their implementation.

title: Getting Started with ChatGPT
summary: Guides on setting up ChatGPT and using basic prompts for various tasks.
content: This section provides step-by-step instructions on how to set up ChatGPT and begin interacting with it using simple prompts. It includes examples of tasks like answering questions and summarizing text.

title: Mastering AI Image Prompting
